name: May Angels fall down
description:
“It's like a haven for those who get easily lost in the crowd.”

Play as Sangha, a lonely runaway who follows a compassionate stranger named Joon,
in hopes of finding a place to call home. Yet, the place she arrived at is not what she expected… and she must find a way out before it consumes her.

A 2D HORROR EXPLORATION GAME

Set in an eerie, grotesque cult called ‘Icarus,’
a twisted world of human cruelty and desperation.

ENTANGLE YOURSELF

In a web of devotion and dark rituals, where the boundary between
angelic salvation and personal demons hazes.

ESCAPE FROM A PLACE WITHOUT LIGHT

Save yourself from various monsters, and try to unravel the truth that lies beneath the semblance of trust.

Features

  • Compelling narrative filled with complex characters, moral dilemmas, and emotional twists.
  • Branching paths where your choices impact the characters' relationships and fates.
  • Puzzles requiring quick reflexes and judgment paired with puzzles that require a more thoughtful, observational approach.
  • An atmospheric setting for exploring a claustrophobic underground cult without sunlight, whilst uncovering its dark secrets.
  • Various depictions of human cruelty and the extent to which people would do to silence their own demons.

Controls

  • Arrow keys — Movement
  • Enter or Space bar — Interact
  • Save — Interact with Save points
  • Shift or F5 — Return to Title screen
  • F4 — Toggle Fullscreen/Window modes
  • F3 — Change display size
